00016 /**
00017  * routines to resize images and handle downloads
00018  * @package kata_utility
00019  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00020  */
00021 class ImageUtility {
00022 
00023     const IMGERR_TOOBIG = 1;
00024     const IMGERR_TOOSMALL = 2;
00025     const IMGERR_UNKNOWNFORMAT = 4;
00026 
00027     const UPL_TOOBIG = 1; //file too big
00028     const UPL_INTERNAL = 2; //internal error
00029     const UPL_EXTENSION = 3; //file extension not allowed
00030 
00031     private $imageQuality = 95;
00032 
00033     /**
00034      * read a gif,jpg,png from disk and return image
00035      * @param string $filename
00036      * @return image
00037      */
00038     function read($filename) {
00039         if (!file_exists($filename)) {
00040             return false;
00041         }
00042 
00043         $img = false;
00044         $temp = getimagesize($filename);
00045         switch ($temp[2]) {
00046             case IMAGETYPE_GIF :
00047                 $img = imagecreatefromgif($filename);
00048                 break;
00049             case IMAGETYPE_JPEG :
00050                 $img = imagecreatefromjpeg($filename);
00051                 break;
00052             case IMAGETYPE_PNG :
00053                 $img = imagecreatefrompng($filename);
00054                 break;
00055         }
00056 
00057         return $img;
00058     }
00059 
00060     /**
00061      * write the given image to disk
00062      * @param image $img
00063      * @param int $type imagetype, IMAGETYPE_GIF usw.
00064      * @param string $filename
00065      */
00066     function write($img, $type, $filename) {
00067         switch ($type) {
00068             case IMAGETYPE_GIF :
00069                 return imagegif($img, $filename);
00070                 break;
00071             case IMAGETYPE_JPEG :
00072                 return imagejpeg($img, $filename, $this->imageQuality);
00073                 break;
00074             case IMAGETYPE_PNG :
00075                 return imagepng($img, $filename, 9, PNG_ALL_FILTERS);
00076                 break;
00077             default :
00078                 throw new Exception('write: Uknown image type');
00079         }
00080     }
00081 
00082     /**
00083      * set image write quality. 0-100, regardless of imagetype
00084      * @param int $quality 0=worst 100=best
00085      */
00086     function setQuality($quality) {
00087         $this->imageQuality=max(0,min($quality,100));
00088     }

00091     /**
00092      * simply create a thumbnail, dont make it proportional
00093      * @param image $image
00094      * @param int $width
00095      * @param int $height
00096      */
00097     function makeThumbnail($image, $width, $height) {
00098         $thumb = imagecreatetruecolor($width, $height);
00099         imagecopyresampled($thumb, $image, 0, 0, 0, 0, $width, $height, imagesx($image), imagesy($image));
00100         return $thumb;
00101     }
00102 
00103     /**
00104      * enshure picture fits proportionally into the destionation size. this
00105      * could possibly result in the picture being cropped
00106      * @param image $image
00107      * @param int $max_x target width
00108      * @param int $max_y target height
00109      */
00110     function makeThumbnailProportional($image, $max_x, $max_y) {
00111         $width = $max_x;
00112         $height = $max_y;
00113 
00114         $width_orig = imagesx($image);
00115         $height_orig = imagesy($image);
00116 
00117         if ($width_orig < $height_orig) {
00118             $height = ($max_x / $width_orig) * $height_orig;
00119         } else {
00120             $width = ($max_y / $height_orig) * $width_orig;
00121         }
00122 
00123         if ($width < $max_x) {
00124             $width = $max_x;
00125             $height = ($max_x / $width_orig) * $height_orig;
00126         }
00127 
00128         if ($height < $max_y) {
00129             $height = $max_y;
00130             $width = ($max_y / $height_orig) * $width_orig;
00131         }
00132 
00133         // first cutout the region we want to use, otherwise thumbs for different sizes look different
00134         $thumb = imagecreatetruecolor($width, $height);
00135         imagecopyresampled($thumb, $image, 0, 0, 0, 0, $width, $height, $width_orig, $height_orig);
00136 
00137         // then scale this region to the wanted size
00138         $thumb2 = imagecreatetruecolor($max_x, $max_y);
00139         $w1 = ($width / 2) - ($max_x / 2);
00140         $h1 = ($height / 2) - ($max_y / 2);
00141         imagecopyresampled($thumb2, $thumb, 0, 0, $w1, $h1, $max_x, $max_y, $max_x, $max_y);
00142 
00143         return $thumb2;
00144     }
00145 
00146 /**
00147  * does the image conform to given parameters?
00148  * @param string $filename ...
00149  * @param int $maxwidth
00150  * @param int $maxheight
00151  * @param int minwidth
00152  * @param int minheight
00153  * @param mixed IMGERR_ codes
00154  */
00155     function isImageInvalid($filename, $maxwidth, $maxheight, $minwidth = 1, $minheight = 1) {
00156         list ($width, $height, $type, $attr) = getimagesize($filename);
00157 
00158         if (($type != IMAGETYPE_GIF) && ($type != IMAGETYPE_JPEG) && ($type != IMAGETYPE_PNG)) {
00159             return ImageUtility :: IMGERR_UNKNOWNFORMAT;
00160         }
00161         if ($width > $maxwidth) {
00162             return ImageUtility :: IMGERR_TOOBIG;
00163         }
00164         if ($height > $maxheight) {
00165             return ImageUtility :: IMGERR_TOOBIG;
00166         }
00167         if ((false !== $minheight) && ($height < $minheight)) {
00168             return ImageUtility :: IMGERR_TOOSMALL;
00169         }
00170         if ((false !== $minwidth) && ($width < $minwidth)) {
00171             return ImageUtility :: IMGERR_TOOSMALL;
00172         }
00173 
00174         return false;
00175     }

00178 /**
00179  * reduce several upload-errors to 3 general ones
00180  * @param string $fieldname name="" of the upload-input-element
00181  * @return mixed true=success, false=no file given, UPLOAD_ERR_
00182  */
00183     function simpleUploadError($fieldname) {
00184         if (isset ($_FILES[$fieldname]['name']) && (empty ($_FILES[$fieldname]['error']))) {
00185             if (is_uploaded_file($_FILES[$fieldname]['tmp_name'])) {
00186                 return true;
00187             }
00188         }
00189 
00190 
00191         switch ($_FILES[$fieldname]['error']) {
00192             case UPLOAD_ERR_FORM_SIZE :
00193             case UPLOAD_ERR_INI_SIZE :
00194                 return ImageUtility :: UPL_TOOBIG;
00195                 break;
00196 
00197             case UPLOAD_ERR_PARTIAL :
00198             case UPLOAD_ERR_NO_TMP_DIR :
00199             case UPLOAD_ERR_CANT_WRITE :
00200                 return ImageUtility :: UPL_INTERNAL;
00201                 break;
00202 
00203             case UPLOAD_ERR_EXTENSION :
00204                 return ImageUtility :: UPL_EXTENSION;
00205                 break;
00206 
00207             case UPLOAD_ERR_NO_FILE :
00208             default :
00209                 return false;
00210                 break;
00211         }
00212     }

00214         /**
00215          * @var white skin color tone
00216          */
00217         public $whiteSkin = 0x793B24;
00218         /**
00219          * @var black skin color tone
00220          */
00221         public $blackSkin = 0xFEC5BF;
00222 
00223 /**
00224  * try to classify how likely the picture contains nudity.
00225  * warning: O(scary) (read: can take several seconds depending for big pictures)
00226  *
00227  * @param resource $img image-resource of the picture to classify
00228  * @return float 0=no nudity 100=full frontal nudity ^^
00229  */
00230     function getNudity($img)
00231     {
00232         if(!$img) return false;
00233 
00234         $x = imagesx($img)-1;
00235         $y = imagesy($img)-1;
00236         $score = 0;
00237         $arA = array();
00238         $arB = array();
00239 
00240         $arA['R'] = ($this->whiteSkin >> 16) & 0xFF;
00241         $arA['G'] = ($this->whiteSkin >> 8) & 0xFF;
00242         $arA['B'] = $this->whiteSkin & 0xFF;
00243 
00244         $arB['R'] = ($this->blackSkin >> 16) & 0xFF;
00245         $arB['G'] = ($this->blackSkin >> 8) & 0xFF;
00246         $arB['B'] = $$this->blackSkin & 0xFF;
00247 
00248         $xPoints = array($x/8, $x/4, ($x/8 + $x/4), $x-($x/8 + $x/4), $x-($x/4), $x-($x/8));
00249         $yPoints = array($y/8, $y/4, ($y/8 + $y/4), $y-($y/8 + $y/4), $y-($y/8), $y-($y/8));
00250         $zPoints = array($xPoints[2], $yPoints[1], $xPoints[3], $y);
00251 
00252         for($i=1; $i<=$x; $i++) {
00253             for($j=1; $j<=$y; $j++) {
00254                 $color = imagecolorat($img, $i, $j);
00255                 if($color >= $this->whiteSkin && $color <= $this->blackSkin) {
00256                     $color = array('R'=> ($color >> 16) & 0xFF, 'G'=> ($color >> 8) & 0xFF, 'B'=> $color & 0xFF);
00257                     if($color['G'] >= $arA['G'] && $color['G'] <= $arB['G'] && $color['B'] >= $arA['B'] && $color['B'] <= $arB['B']) {
00258                         if($i >= $zPoints[0] && $j >= $zPoints[1] && $i <= $zPoints[2] && $j <= $zPoints[3]) {
00259                             $score += 3;
00260                         } elseif($i <= $xPoints[0] || $i >=$xPoints[5] || $j <= $yPoints[0] || $j >= $yPoints[5]) {
00261                             $score += 0.10;
00262                         } elseif($i <= $xPoints[0] || $i >=$xPoints[4] || $j <= $yPoints[0] || $j >= $yPoints[4]) {
00263                             $score += 0.40;
00264                         } else {
00265                             $score += 1.50;
00266                         }
00267                     }//score
00268                 }//colorinrange
00269             }//forj
00270         }//fori
00271 
00272         $score = min(100,round( ($score * 100) / ($x * $y) , 2));
00273         return $score;
00274     }
